Package harkadventurer.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EnemyObserver
    A class can implement the EnemyObserver interface when it wants to be informed of the death of enemy characters.
    FriendlyObserver
    A class can implement the FriendlyObserver interface when it wants to be informed of the death of friendly characters.
    Targetable
    A class that implements the Targetable interface can be targeted by abilities.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ability
    Ability-type objects store all information pertaining to an ability, including its name, base damage, dice, targeting and effect.
    Character
    Character-type objects store a character's name, maximum health, current health and list of abilities.
    NonPlayerCharacter
    A character controlled by the Game Master.
    PlayerCharacter
    A character controlled by a player.
    Team
    Team-type objects have a name and store a list of characters.
